contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses|Lando (disambiguation){{!}}Lando}} {{Infobox Christian leader | type = Pope |honorific-prefix=Pope |name=Lando |image=Pope Lando Illustration.jpg |image_size=220px |birth_name=Lando |term_start=July or August 913 |term_end=February or March 914 |predecessor=[[Pope Anastasius III|Anastasius III]] |successor=[[Pope John X|John X]] |birth_date=??? |birth_place=[[Sabina (region)|Sabina]], [[Papal States]] |death_date=February or March 914 |death_place=[[Rome]], [[Papal States]] }} '''Pope Lando''' (also known as '''Landus'''<ref>[http://books.google.ca/books?id=7Y09AAAAYAAJ&pg=PA200&lpg=PA200&dq=LANDONIS+LANDONE+papa&source=bl&ots=PL-oVsg9bp&sig=wdjIxefQwAzAp4HNrhRhD5nRqG4&hl=en&ei=oa-CSsm0CNW3tweXq-nKCg&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=6#v=onepage&q=LANDONIS%20LANDONE%20papa&f=false De vita et scriptis Liudprandi, Episcopi Cremonensis]</ref><ref>{{Citation | last = Platina | first = Bartolomeo | authorlink = Bartolomeo Platina | title = The Lives of the Popes From The Time Of Our Saviour Jesus Christ to the Accession of Gregory VII | publisher = Griffith Farran & Co. | location = London | pages = 245 | volume = I | year= 1479 | url = http://www.archive.org/details/thelivesofthepop01platuoft | accessdate= 2013-04-25. }}</ref>) was the [[Pope|head]] of the [[Catholic Church]] from either July or August 913 to his death in 914.<ref>Fedele, Pietro (1910). "Ricerche per la storia di Rome e del papato al. sec. X". ''Archivo della Reale Società Romana di Storia Patria'', 33: 177–247.</ref><ref name="ce">{{CathEncy|wstitle=Pope Lando}}</ref> Lando was born in [[Sabina (region)|Sabina]], [[Italy]]. His father was reportedly named Taino. He did not change his name on his accession. Lando is thought to have been a candidate of [[Theophylact I, Count of Tusculum]], who helped him to be elected pope.<ref>''Lando'', '''The Oxford Dictionary of Popes''', ed. J.N.D. Kelly, (Oxford University Press, 1988), 121.</ref> During his reign, Arab raiders destroyed the cathedral of Vescovio in Sabina.<ref>Roger Collins, ''Keepers of the Keys of Heaven: A History of the Papacy'', (Basic Books, 2009), 175.</ref> Lando was pope during the period later known as the [[Saeculum obscurum]], which lasted from 904 to 964. He was the last pope to use a [[papal name]] that had not been previously used until the election of [[Pope Francis]] in 2013.{{efn|[[Pope John Paul I]], elected in 1978, took a new combination of already used names, in honour of his two immediate predecessors, [[Pope John XXIII|John XXIII]] and [[Pope Paul VI|Paul VI]].<ref>[http://www.papaluciani.com/eng/conclave.htm The Conclave : August 25th - 26th, 1978]. Accessed 2013-03-18.</ref>}} ==Sources== *Claudio Rendina. ''I papi. Storia e segreti''. Newton Compton, Rome, 1983. ==Notes== {{Notelist}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.catholic-forum.com/saints/pope0121.htm Catholic Forum:] Pope Lando *[http://saints.sqpn.com/ncd04623.htm New Catholic Dictionary:] Pope Lando *[http://www.archelaos.com/popes/details.aspx?id=137 Archelaos:] Pope Lando {{S-start}} {{s-rel|ca}} {{s-bef|before=[[Pope Anastasius III|Anastasius III]]}} {{s-ttl|title=[[Pope]]|years=913–914}} {{s-aft|after=[[Pope John X|John X]]}} {{end}} {{Popes}} {{Catholicism}} {{History of the Roman Catholic Church}} {{Authority control |VIAF= |GND=100951449 }} {{Persondata |name= Lando |alternative names= | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Pope Pope |date of birth= |place of birth= [[Sabine|Sabina]], [[Italy]] |date of death= 914 |place of death= [[Rome]], [[Italy]] }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lando}} [[Category:Popes]] [[Category:Italian popes]] [[Category:10th-century archbishops]] [[Category:People from Lazio]] [[Category:914 deaths]] [[Category:10th-century Italian people]] [[Category:Year of birth unknown]] {{Pope-stub}}
